title: What are the "Inconspicuous Chains" and how do they affect human relationships?
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author talks about the concept of "unconscious chains" discussed by Ermo. When two or more people establish a deep connection, a hidden relationship of vital forces is formed, regardless of distance. The author argues that these chains can behave similarly to those created by conscious magic, explaining phenomena such as thinking the same thing or experiencing the same sensation. In this final part, the author emphasizes that the location of the chain's connections is the animating component called the "body of life" related to the blood. The natural bond established by blood constitutes a potential connection.

Ciò che, sia in bene, sia in male, si attira una persona del gruppo, tende da sé ad estendersi agli al- tri che le sono uniti nella vita e a realizzarsi in modi che possono essere anche diversi, tanto che di solito sfugge l'in- timo nesso. Ho detto con intenzione « uniti nella vita ». La sede dei rapporti di catena è appunto quel quid animato, fra il corporeo e l'incorporeo, chiamato dagli esoteristi « corpo di vita ». Esso ha rapporto col sangue. Si comprende, da qui, che la consanguineità, il legame naturale stabilito dal sangue, costituisce in sé stesso un vincolo potenziale di catena.
last_phrase: In conclusion, it can be said that the concept of a chain reaction, or "destiny," is intimately linked to the life force that binds us all. Whether through bloodline or affinity, our actions and reactions have a ripple effect that extends far beyond our individual selves. While the strength of these ties may have diminished in modern times, we can still see echoes of their power in ancient traditions and beliefs. It is up to us to recognize and honor this connection, and to strive for actions that benefit not just ourselves, but the greater whole.
